item.title: Video Editor | LONG TERM | Old Entertainment - History | Youtube Agency - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor | LONG TERM | Old Entertainment - History | Youtube Agency
Take a look at this video, note the editing details throughout.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xT_CLU0DlMY

Are you able to edit a video like this?

The goal is to edit 4 weekly videos of 30 minutes each, at least.
The price per edited minute is $1. Weekly Total 120$. Monthly equals 480$.
The editing of each video must be ready in 2 days.

We´re looking for someone with the following requirements

1º Fast response times
2º Good understanding of storytelling and youtube retention.
3º No use of stock content.

***[IMPORTANT] Your offer WON'T be read if you do not attach previous video editing work.

If you feel confident to do this style of editing, send me a message to start today.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 23, 2024 18:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor for Weekly/Biweekly YouTube and TikTok Vlogs

We are seeking a skilled video editor to help create engaging vlogs for our YouTube and TikTok channels to help grow a new channel. The project involves editing weekly/biweekly vlogs based on a guide script, showcasing an independent artist's journey and promoting their music and lifestyle activities.

Key Requirements:Communication Skills: Clear and timely communication is vital. We value openness and the ability to discuss ideas and feedback constructively.

Punctuality & Professionalism: We’re looking for individuals who are reliable, meet deadlines, and maintain a high level of professionalism in all interactions.

Storytelling Ability: Candidates should possess strong storytelling skills, able to weave compelling narratives that engage viewers, effectively convey our brand’s message, and capture the energy of the artist’s journey.

Experience: Proven experience in creating vlogs or similar content for social media platforms, with a portfolio demonstrating your work in this area.

Project Details:Content: Weekly vlogs for YouTube and TikTok, based on a guide script discussed before editing each week. Videos/Vlogs will be priced as follows:
1.  10-15 minutes long + 45-60 sec teaser= $20
2. 15- 30 minutes long+ 45-60 sec teaser =$35
3. 30- 60 minutes long +45-60sec teaser =$50


Duration: The project will run for about weeks, with  videos delivered per week or as needed by client.Editing Requirement: No more than four cuts per video.
Compensation:We offer a fixed rate of the amounts mentioned above upon completetion and video delivery.

To Apply:
Please submit your application with:

A brief introduction highlighting your experience with video editing and any relevant experience creating vlogs or similar content.Links to your portfolio or examples of previous work that demonstrate your ability to create engaging social media content, especially any projects involving vlogs or storytelling.
Confirmation of your agreement with the fixed-rate compensation.

We are excited to find a video editor who shares our passion for storytelling and can help bring our brand’s story to life. If you are enthusiastic about creating content that makes a difference, resonates with a diverse audience, and captures the vibrant energy of an independent artist’s journey, we look forward to your application

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 23, 2024 18:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editing ( Shorts, Reels) e-com products - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a professional Video editor.

1) Must understand the videos they edit get used for social media ads

2) Must understand Voice cloning and even Ai characters

3) Must be capable of repurposing long videos into short and taking the important parts

4) Able to be creative and merge (Video ideas together) like two podcasts together and so on.

Editor must be highly experienced, this position can be a long term position, Editor must be capable of understanding the vision of the business (Cause his expected to look for content and clone successful edits and create different hooks , different titles) to match his video.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 23, 2024 18:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: Egypt
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editors For Kids Channel

Looking for video editors for our channel.

Each video/clip will be around 2-4 minutes. The pay is $50 per clip regardless of it's length.
You will get the song, or the script.
You will get the raw greenscreen videos of kids.

Your task is to produce the final video:
- cut the green screen
- pick proper shots for scenes
- add sound effects (freesound, zapsplat)
- add background and foreground images (freepik)
- add vix (youtube green screen effects)

You should handle excellently:
- timing
- framing
- composition

Teams preferred for work. If you have a team of video editors, please welcome.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 23, 2024 18:40 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: KGZ
click to apply

item.title: Youtube/Meta Media Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Siamo alla ricerca di un Video Editor italiano per editare e creare videoclip per sponsorizzate su YouTube e Meta (Facebook e Instagram).

Cosa cerchiamo:

Abilità ed esperienza nel montaggio video
Creatività nel rendere i video più professionali e accattivanti
Passione per il video marketing e la produzione di contenuti visivi di qualità


Progetto iniziale:
Ti invieremo un video di  già registrato per produrre un video pubblicitario di 3 minuti massimo su formato YT e FB  e ci affideremo alle tue competenze e alla tua creatività per renderlo più professionale e interessante.



Budget: $50
Posted On: June 23, 2024 18:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Italy

item.title: AI video Generation (short clips) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking a skilled professional to assist in creating demo videos for my business intelligence tool using AI-based platforms such as InVideo AI.

Responsibilities:

Create engaging and informative demo videos showcasing our business intelligence tool.

Utilize InVideo AI or similar platforms to produce high-quality video content.

Incorporate provided text, images, and video clips into the demos.

Access our BI platform to generate additional digital assets as needed.

Requirements:

Proficiency in AI-based video creation tools, particularly InVideo AI.

Experience in creating professional demo videos.

Ability to effectively integrate text, images, and video content.

Strong attention to detail and creativity.

If you have a portfolio of previous work or relevant examples, please include them in your application. Looking forward to working with a talented video creation specialist!

Best regards

Hourly Range: $12.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 18:26 UTC
Category: AI Video Generation & Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, AI-Generated Video, Demo Video, Short Video Ad, Social Media Video, AI Speech-to-Text, Generative AI Prompt Engineering, Video Editing
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, AI-Generated Video, Demo Video, Short Video Ad, Social Media Video, AI Speech-to-Text, Generative AI Prompt Engineering, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply
